attributes.action: Breaking manifesto promises should be illegal and reprimanded as fraudulent.
attributes.additional_details: Broken manifesto promises within the first 6 months should be brought to parliament's attention and action taken against the party that has broken it's promised to the public.
attributes.background: Penalties for breaking manifesto promises within the first 6 months of winning a general election.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
